Articles.Content: Lately, where I live in Hong Kong there is a risk of an epidimic named MERS, it's already had it's first victims, and it is rather similar to an earlier disease SARS which I barely missed myself, and a train station a few minute's walk away from my home has been partly locked down due to a confirmed victim being there (school bus drops me off here- I should be slightly scared.)

First! Also, I experienced a lite version of this with Ebola.

(Yes I live in the USA)

I do not envy a virologist's job in this day and age.

Also I expected this to a meme about Mars and was pleasantly disappointed.

Oh noes - Best of luck! That's.. horrifying..

I wish you guys well ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Hopefully it can be diagnosed soon - Hope the victim gets well soon too ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Agh, no wonder the Philippine immigration keeps sending medical check cards for infections!
